name: BP-  DIY Bluetooth Speaker Kit
description:
So you wanna make your own set of Bluetooth speakers, why not! here's everything you need to do it yourself minus the casing that you will build to give it a home. Pictured are examples of DIY models by: (feel free to contact them if you are interested in their work!) Image 2: Downloadable Cardboard template by Matt Nicholson Image 3:Evan Melnyk Image 4:aaron Daley Image 5:Phil Savard Specifications: - 5 watt class "D" stereo audio amplifier - 2 fullrange 2" magnetically shielded speakers - Full Bluetooth v2.0 + EDR compatibility - Auxiliary 1/8" audio line in (for non-bluetooth connectivity) - 9v wall adapter included (110V/220V with North America Plug) - rechargable battery, allows for up to 8 hours of "wireless" use

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

hacks/mods/tricks (feel free to send us any of your own) - Rad upgraded Danish High end substitute speakers at Parts express - Nice looking free Iphone app that lets you tweak your eq to get the best sound from your DIY kit called EQu

name: BP - Kendall Portable Speaker
description:
Due to overwhelming interest in this product we've sold out of the first batch!! we will be making more in the near future and to be notified when we re-stock please fell free to sign yourself for our e-mail updates. Oh, and just in case you are handy and feel like making one for yourself right away you could purchase one of our DIY kits here
Our new Kendall music companion is the perfect solution for those of you who like to have some decent sounding music where wiring and/or access to power might not allow the possibility. Absolutely perfect to take to the park for a picnic or the cabin for the weekend as well as used to play music in rooms where you might not have a traditional stereo setup. Paired with our freely downloadable iphone application it turns into a great little alarm clock. Specifications: - Solid walnut casing with laser etched acrylic speaker grill both hand produced in Montreal, Canada. - Stereo 5 watt class "D" audio amplifier - 2 x fullrange 2" magnetically shielded speakers - Full Bluetooth v2.0 + EDR compatibility - Auxiliary 1/8" audio line in (for non-bluetooth connectivity) - 9v wall adapter included for110V/220V operation - Ships with North America Plug, International orders will require simple plug adapter. - 4 Hour Battery run time* (* at average music volume) - 6 hour charge time - 1000 mAh lithium battery - Freely downloadable ipod©/iphone© application to allow you to wake to your own music or sounds
Size: - 9" Wide x 5" High x 2.25" deep Buy this if:
- want to play music at dinner partys and not "party" parties, don't get me wrong, it's rather loud ......... but won't drown out a room of screaming teenagers.
- you like Bon Iver, Feist, Wintersleep, Lykee li, Bahamas or any other kinda of cool "alternative" style band, if you are into death metal or gangsta rap, no disrespect..... it will play, but it ain't gonna sound any good through the Kendall. (check the link below to a mix of sample music that will make your Kendall happy)
- You plan on using it as a "secondary" audio setup, it's a great little unit but cannot replace a full sized hi-fi audio setup. - if you want a companion to your labtop, tablet or smartphone to give you better audio while watching a movie etc...


Here's a sample mix put together by our good buddy Curse of the Multiples so you can see what kind of tunes the Kendall is perfected to play:

Kendall Playlist from michael.giles.7798 on 8tracks Radio.

Engineering solutions by: Consult and Robocut

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP - Oil lamp
description:
This replica oil lamp runs a bank of LED bulbs using batteries... it's everything that's awesome and vintage but with modern dependable technology! Thanks World Famous! Specs: LED Bulbs Glass Shield Pressed Metal Frame approx 12" tall

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP - Hella Slingshot
description:
We couldn't help ourselves but team up with Hella Slingshots when we saw the magic they were creating in their Californian workspace. "These one of a kind slingshots are hand made in California from a split fork tree branch. Each is carefully airbrushed with acrylic paint. The leather projectile pouch is attached using natural latex tubing and sinew" * as this is a natural product, picture is for "illustrative" purposes only, small, natural variances might occur in the product you receive. approx size: 4" x 9" Important Safety Guidelines - Slingshots are not toys. Even though slingshots are not restricted items, children should always be supervised by adults when playing with slingshots. - Always wear eye protections. You can get them from our website for from any hardware store. - Know your target and what's behind it. - Make sure you have an adequate backstop for your target. - Inspect latex tubing before each shot for any signs of wear, brittleness or breakage. Do not shoot if latex tubing is worn or damaged in any way! Replace damaged or worn latex tubing immediately. You can send your slingshot back and I can - Do not shoot at hard surfaces or at the surface of water. Slingshot ammo may bounce off or ricochet and hit someone or something you had not intended to hit.

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP- Tactical Watch
description:
We teamed up with Neuvo Watches and added a tactical army green nylon strap to one of their most popular watches from their prospector collection. We've also added a Nice laser etched logo on the backside of the watch. Specs: 12-24 Hour Display Chronograph Hourly Chime Backlit display Alarm Waterproof 3cm x 3cm face Max wrist size: 20cm

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP- Army Blanket
description:
Another item we "sourced" from our friends at World Famous, (Canada's largest and one of the country's oldest outdoor equipment suppliers) Super rad oversized army style blanket, amazing around a cozy campfire or in the den with a cup of baileys coffee. Specs: Olive Green 55% Wool 45% Blended Fibres Size: 60” x 80” approx. Dry Clean Only Made in India

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP - Mini Antler Keychain
description:
An ode to the north by NORTH. This naturally-shed antler keyring is hand-painted with a bright and opaque orange, green and tan colour palette then sealed everywhere except where the antler’s natural patina has been maintained. With laser etched "be prepared" detail.... approx 2.5" - 100% Natural and each is unique, small variances (including size) will occur from photograph.

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP- Maple Jug
description:
A collaborative effort with Marianne Chenard this porcelin container is design for use to store maple syrup (but works for any liquid) care: It is best to wash the bottle by hand, with hot water and soap as your regular dishes. The plug is premium natural cork. It is covered with a natural beeswax to help the syrup from cristallizing in the cork. Syrup always gets everywhere! If it happens to cristallize on the beeswax, rinse the plug with a little hot water and let it dry completely before putting it back in the bottle.

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP- Apron
description:
100% Cotton Aprons, perfect for the workshop, studio or garage! Features: Stationary Lower Patch Pocket Combination Upper Swing Pocket with Pencil Slot Eyelets at Waist and Neck for Tie-On Waistband and Neck Tie in 10 oz. Unbleached Natural Duck (not preshrunk) or in 10 oz. Preshrunk Fisher Herringbone

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP - Nautical Knife
description:
Based on the legendary Otter Knife this replica has the traditional "Anchor" inset into the Knifes handle as well as a little extra bonus etching on the blade and a nice little furni logo on the handle. 3" blade 3.75" retracted size. laser etched graphic "BE PREPARED" on blade.

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP- Tuques
description:
One Size Unisex Knit Beanie made by the folks over at World Famous (Canada's largest and one of the country's oldest outdoor equipment suppliers) we spruced up their standard model with a nice laser etched leather logo....just the right amount of panache! Available in Army Green or Safety Orange.

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP - Moccasins
description:
This is our 5th collaborations with a family owned business with almost 40 years of experience making snowshoes, moccasins and other Indian handcrafts here in Canada. These crepe soled ankle high moccasins are made from supple “caramel” leather. Each pair is skillfully crafted by hand in small batches less than 250kms from our Montreal workshop. Features: - Custom leather logo's on the tongue and side heel - Leather and Cotton laces in each Box - US Standard Sizing - Extremly limited run (only 12 pairs!)

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: BP - Swiss Military Pack
description:
The fourth piece in our collection thanks to World Famous, this deadstock Swiss military backpack is made from heavy duty coated nylon with leather strapping and an internal metal frame. They are all in "used" but not "abused" condition.... Specs: Olive Green 65 litre capacity. Incredibly tough Highly water resistant Furni Collaborative Laser Etched Leather tag. Dimensions: Main area is 15 1/2 x 5 x 18"h. and has a Small Flapped pocket on the front.

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

NEXT BATCH SHIPS MARCH 25TH 2013

name: BP - Camping Laces
description:
Who doenst need rad laces (or a backup pair at least) these are super traditional Canadiana laces, makes any pair of boots look like you just climbed out of the Canadian wilderness. Specs: 1 pair 60”-152cm laces Ideal for 8-9 eyelet boots Braided outer Made in USA

Photographed by: Julie Langenegger Lachance

name: // 2012 ROCKASSINS - MENS
description:
It’s time again to “rock the moc”. We’ve teamed up with a family owned business with almost 40 years of experience making snowshoes, moccasins and other Indian handcrafts here in Canada for our third time to offer you these beauties. These crepe soled ankle high moccasins are made from supple “black”leather. Each pair is skillfully crafted by hand in small batches less than 250kms from our Montreal workshop.

Features:
- Custom leather logo's on the tongue and side heel
- Leather and Cotton laces in each Box
- Mini "Axe" pendant for cutting down mini trees.
- US Standard Sizing

description:

name: // BOTY - WATCH BLACK
description:
BLOOD OF THE YOUNG X FURNI - WATCH
Our good friends over at Blood of the young in Toronto, Canada hit us up and wanted to do something fun for the new year, we decided a limited run watch would be perfect. We kept it classy with a simple black face and some slick gold details...quote on the back reads " No Fate but what we make" a great motto for 2012! get them quick!

Features:
LCD unisex wrist watch. Hard plastic body. Gold coloured plating on clasp and watch back. Stopwatch and alarm features. Hourly chime on/off, 12/24 hours selectable. Indigo illumination. Face dimensions: 1 1/4” x 1 1/8”(31.75 x 28.5 mm). Fits wrists up to 8" (203 mm) in diameter.

name: // POKETO - WATCH RED
description:
POKETO - COLOURPARTY WATCH - RED
This collaboration between Poketo and Furni is a modern take of the classic 80s and early 90s style digital wrist watch. Minimal, bold design with Poketo colors on the face, stainless steel buttons/clasp, and Poketo x Furni branding engraved on the back.

Features:
LCD unisex wrist watch. Hard plastic body. Stainless steel buttons, clasp and watch back. Stopwatch and alarm features. Hourly chime on/off, 12/24 hours selectable. Indigo illumination. Face dimensions: 1 1/4” x 1 1/8”(31.75 x 28.5 mm). Fits wrists up to 8" (203 mm) in diameter.

name: // POKETO - WATCH WHITE
description:
POKETO - COLOURPARTY WATCH - WHITE
This collaboration between Poketo and Furni is a modern take of the classic 80s and early 90s style digital wrist watch. Minimal, bold design with Poketo colors on the face, stainless steel buttons/clasp, and Poketo x Furni branding engraved on the back.

Features:
LCD unisex wrist watch. Hard plastic body. Stainless steel buttons, clasp and watch back. Stopwatch and alarm features. Hourly chime on/off, 12/24 hours selectable. Indigo illumination. Face dimensions: 1 1/4” x 1 1/8”(31.75 x 28.5 mm). Fits wrists up to 8" (203 mm) in diameter.

name: // FURNI x RBW 2010
description:
FURNI X RBW 2010 RE-ISSUE
Re-Issue of our original Raised by Wolves and Furni digital watch collaboration! * 1980’s style LCD unisex wrist watch. * Phone book, stopwatch, countdown timer and multiple alarm features w/melody setting. * Hourly chime, 12/24 hours selectable and "dual time" mode * Water-resistant with PVC strap.(Not Waterproof! please don't shower with it!) * Indiglo style backlight. * face dimensions: 1 1/4” x 1 1/2” * Available in Grey, Yellow and Green * “this ain't the time to have your wrists freezin” engraved on watch back About Raised by Wolves In historic folklore, children raised by wolves were often gifted with superior strength, intelligence and morals such as Rome-founders: Remus and Romulus and Mogli, king of the jungle. This concept forms the base of Canadian label Raised by Wolves as they aim to create a new sense of loyalty among individuals who continue to pride themselves on personal strength and values. Founded in 2008, Raised by Wolves takes inspiration from all facets of underground culture, while maintaining standards in products they feel represent their personal taste. In addition, Raised by Wolves embraces the power of collective individuality, working closely with friends and family on unique design concepts. 100% Furious.

description:
ALBA "Media Edition"- X DOMISION - YELLOW
We teamed up with our friends at DOMISON in Montreal to make 3 of these unique clocks covered in 100% wool fabric from Denmark that's also used to cover their Toledo sofa's! They will be on display during Design Week in Toronto at the MOTO show, more info here
* Wrapped in 1/16" Yellow Wool Fabric from Denmark * Acrylic Faceplate * Soft Tactile silicone buttons * Non-Slip Silicone base with debossed graphic * Built in Audio amplifier and speaker (for 1/8" input source such as ipod©/iphone©, walkman©, mp3 player or computer) * Simple built in alarm with snooze function * Wall transformer with interchangeable adapters (works with CAN,US,UK,EU and AUS plugs) * Freely downloadable ipod©/iphone© application to allow you to wake to your own music or sounds with purchase (to redeem see instructions) * 10 stage dimmable display * Larger LED display dimensions: 6” x 6” x 2.5” EXTRAS

name: // MILLER BAMBOO BOARD
description:
MILLER - BAMBOO CUTTING/PRESENTATION BOARD
Here's a real smart and safe way to prepare vegetables etc and get them to the cooking pot or pan without having to move the entire cutting board, simply dice/chop your ingredients, slide them into the inset bowl, remove the bowl and transport it to the awaiting pan. The bowls can also be filled with dip/sauces and board used as a presentation piece. Features: * Durable 1” laminated bamboo construction (bamboo is 16% harder than maple and a highly renewable and environmentally responsible resource) *Includes 2 interchangeable preparation bowls (each bowl is 18/8 stainless steel - 4 1/4" diameter) * Non-Marking rubber feet with Stainless Steel Mounting Screws * Protected with a non-toxic food grade finish. *** Note: Pictured Knife not included. Size: 18" x 12.5" x 2" (Height with Rubber feet)

name: // ALBA DOCK
description:
ALBA DOCK
* Simple dock with audio out * Works with your phones native charger * tested with iphone4© * Phone used for illustrative purposes only, not included. * 1/8" audio cable provided with clock purchase only.

name: // BENNY GOLD PEN AND PAPER WEIGHT
description:
BENNY GOLD PEN AND PAPER WEIGHT
Benny Gold is a solid dude, he's someone we admire and like to say we roll with. He's an amazing artist and designer who's got a solid portfolio (Huf, Mash, Nike, Real Skateboards, Ipath, adidas etc....) We recently teamed up with him to make this solid walnut pen holder and paperweight. Figured is was a nice way to always have a pen handy on your desk! we only made 24 to keep things personal, 12 of them are available through our site, the others through Benny. Get yours now. More about Benny here: www.bennygold.com

name: // "DISASSEMBLY" POSTER
description:
"DISASSEMBLY" POSTER by Todd Mclellan
Photography whiz Todd Mclellan is amazingly talented, he took the time to completely disassemble, arrange and photograph one of our Alba "ME" clocks (that's also why we are giving him 90% of the profit from each sale!)

Print is 18" x 24"





CONTACT US FOR INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING RATES

name: // ALBA "ME" - BALI
description:
ALBA "Media Edition"- BALI
Teaming up with our good friend and amazing designer Karim Charlebois-Zariffa we gave him "carte blanche" to oversee the concept, design and production of these uniquely hand carved clocks on his last trip to Indonesia. The fruits of 30 different carving knives and over three weeks of work! * Limited to 5 units! * Handcarved by Wayan Suastika in Ubud, Bali, Indonesia. * Metal Speaker Grill. * Each clock unique in detail. * Soft Tactile silicone buttons * Built in Audio amplifier and speaker (for 1/8" input source such as ipod©/iphone©, walkman©, mp3 player or computer) * Simple built in alarm with snooze function * Wall transformer with interchangeable adapters (works with CAN,US,UK,EU and AUS plugs) * Freely downloadable ipod©/iphone© application to allow you to wake to your own music or sounds with purchase (to redeem see instructions) * 10 stage dimmable display * Larger LED display * Orange Dock included with audio output and charging capabilities using your native charger (compatible with iphone©4 and newer only) dimensions: 6” x 6” x 2.5” EXTRAS

name: // ALBA "ME" - BARNWOOD
description:
ALBA "Media Edition"- BARNWOOD
Using the wood we salvaged from an over 100 year old barn in Quebec, Canada we tore down with our good buddies we made a limited run of these clocks. We teamed up with Oli and Mer at Magasin General Bruxe Magasin General Bruxe to make it happen! (Most of the other salvaged wood went to make the fixtures for their boutique!) We did a limited run of 14 clocks, 6 available at their physical location and the rest here at our online site. * 100 Year old barnwood casing! * Textured,raw finish with natural "flaws" * Numbered Certificate of Ownership included. * Laser etched series number and logo on Back of Clock * Metal Speaker Grill. * Soft Tactile silicone buttons * Non-Slip Silicone base with debossed graphic * Built in Audio amplifier and speaker (for 1/8" input source such as ipod©/iphone©, walkman©, mp3 player or computer) * Simple built in alarm with snooze function * Wall transformer with interchangeable adapters (works with CAN,US,UK,EU and AUS plugs) * Freely downloadable ipod©/iphone© application to allow you to wake to your own music or sounds with purchase (to redeem see instructions) * 10 stage dimmable display * Larger LED display dimensions: 6” x 6” x 2.5” EXTRAS

name: // KEN DIAMOND WALLET AND BANDANA
description: KEN DIAMOND BIFOLD WALLET LIMITED EDITION Furni x Ken Diamond collaboration. Extremely limited edition natural leather bi-fold wallet. 100% handmade, entirely hand-stitched from cow leather. Features a cash slot, and 2 card slots, laser etched graphic and stamped Ken Diamond logos. Comes with Hand Screened Navy Cotton Bandana (17" x 17") Graphics for this series created by the super talented Daniel Julien NOTE - this item ships free when purchased with other "Furni" items.

name: // LOWTOP MOCCASINS CARAMEL
description:
MID-SUMMER MOCS LIMITED EDITION Furni low-top “Rockassins” It’s time to “rock the moc”. We’ve teamed up a second time with a family owned business with almost 40 years of experience making snowshoes, moccasins and other Indian handcrafts here in Canada to offer you these beauties. These crepe soled low top moccasins are made from supple “caramel” coloured Brazilian leather. Check the bonus details like the eyelets in the instep to keep your feet cool as well as the subtle branding touches like the cotton laces...Each pair will be skillfully crafted by hand to order in small batches less than 250kms from our Montreal workshop. WE WILL BE DOING ONE PRODUCTION RUN ONLY, WHICH COMMENCES AUGUST 4TH 2011 (DELIVERY LATE AUGUST/EARLY SEPTEMBER)

Due to the nature of this hand made product orders will take between 3-5 weeks to produce after the above date and will then be shipped to you. name: // LOWTOP MOCCASINS BLACK
description:
MID-SUMMER MOCS LIMITED EDITION Furni low-top “Rockassins” It’s time to “rock the moc”. We’ve teamed up a second time with a family owned business with almost 40 years of experience making snowshoes, moccasins and other Indian handcrafts here in Canada to offer you these beauties. These crepe soled low top moccasins are made from supple “black” coloured leather. Check the bonus details like the eyelets in the instep to keep your feet cool as well as the subtle branding touches like the cotton laces...Each pair will be skillfully crafted by hand to order in small batches less than 250kms from our Montreal workshop. WE WILL BE DOING ONE PRODUCTION RUN ONLY, WHICH COMMENCES AUGUST 4TH 2011 (DELIVERY LATE AUGUST/EARLY SEPTEMBER)

Due to the nature of this hand made product orders will take between 3-5 weeks to produce after the above date and will then be shipped to you. name: // NEVEREND CLOCK #2 - NATURAL
description:
NEVEREND SERIES #2: UPSO

Neverend is a series of clocks created in conjunction with a select group of incredibly talented artists and designers. Each piece features artwork that is laser-etched onto a 3/8” thick piece of high quality russian birch plywood to create a bold graphic interpretation of the quintessential wall clock. Each installment in the series is limited to 88 pieces and will only be available through furnicreations.com. The clock measures 16"H x 9"W and features custom designed, laser-cut graphics and hands. For the second edition, Kitsune Noir and Furni have teamed with Graphic Artist, Curator & Publisher UPSO UPSO aka. Dustin Hostetler is an illustrator, artist, curator & publisher of a critically acclaimed art magazine. He has presented his work during creative engagements and events—most recently (in 2009) with a lecture at Rhode Island School of Design and his participation on a SXSW panel, "Curating in a Crowd Sourced World". More at http://www.upso.org/ Kitsune Noir: is a culture blog that focuses on art and design, but also ventures into fashion, food, movies and music. It is run solely by Los Angeles based designer Bobby Solomon who started Kitsune Noir in 2007 as an outlet to share the creative things he found in his day to day life. The blog now receives over half a million hits a month from over 152 countries around the world. More at:www.kitsunenoir.com

*** SHIPPING NOTE, THESE ARE MADE TO ORDER, PLEASE ALLOW UP TO 14 WEEKDAYS FOR MANUFACTURING BEFORE WE SHIP

Note: as part of our "edition" series, these limited run items are working "experiments" and/or "collaborations" whose materials and processes allow us to "play" with new ideas and concepts. Due to their limited nature they are only available online and very select retailers and sell out quickly.

name: // NEVEREND CLOCK #1 -BLACK
description:
NEVEREND SERIES #1: DAN FUNDERBERG

Neverend is a series of clocks created in conjunction with a select group of incredibly talented artists and designers. Each piece features artwork that is laser-etched onto a 3/8” thick piece of high quality russian birch plywood to create a bold graphic interpretation of the quintessential wall clock. Each installment in the series is limited to 88 pieces and will only be available through furnicreations.com. The clock measures 16"H x 9"W and features custom designed, laser-cut graphics and hands. For the first edition, Kitsune Noir and Furni have teamed with NY designer Dan Funderburgh. Dan Funderburgh: is a wallpaper designer and artist in Brooklyn, NY. His patterns, prints and installations are varied in content but all demonstrate an unabashed love for decorative arts. With influences ranging from Moorish mosaic to American op art, the work is a repudiation of the fabricated schism between art and decoration. Some of Dan's work can be found in the collections of the Cooper-Hewitt Design Museum and the Miami Museum of Art. More at http://www.danfunderburgh.com/ Kitsune Noir: is a culture blog that focuses on art and design, but also ventures into fashion, food, movies and music. It is run solely by Los Angeles based designer Bobby Solomon who started Kitsune Noir in 2007 as an outlet to share the creative things he found in his day to day life. The blog now receives over half a million hits a month from over 152 countries around the world. More at:www.kitsunenoir.com

name: // DISCO BONES - MIX CD
description:
DISCO BONES PRESENTS - TUNDRA CLAP.


Tundra Clap (320 kbs) by kephroc
Mixed, Chopped and Tomahawked by Keph Le Roc. Old & new grooves with a Disco backbone. Tracklist: 1 - Keph Le Roc / Lazer Loonies & Gypsy Trumpets 2 - Black Joy / Djomani (Louie Austen Vox) 3 - Neighbour / URB 4 - Drop Out Orchestra / Gibbon 5 - Dan The Automator / Rapper's Delight (Van She Tech Remix) 6 - Muscle Brothers / Italo Rhyme Dub (Treasure Fingers Vox) 7 - James Curd / We Just Won't Stop 8 - Turelli / Mekano (Big L Vox) 9 - Banana Clipz / Push Am (Left, Right — Clan in da Front Vox) 10 - Alexander Robotnick / Obsession For The Disco Freaks 11 - Italcimenti / Somewhat You Need 12 - DJ Cleo / Mabebeza 13 - Botttin / Endless Mother (Electriq) 14 - B.W.H. / Stop (Datashat Widescreen Edit) 15 - Love Deluxe / Here Comes That Sound (Instant Funk Vox) 16 - Gary Davis / The Professor's Here (40 Thieves remix) 17 - Pete Herbert / Yo Drums (Original) 18 - DC La Rue / Let Them Dance — PH Edit (Pase Rock Vox) 19 - Micheal Jackson / Sunset Driver

EMILY - WALNUT/ALUMINUM

"show us your skills" competition winner! designed by Greg Wolos sleek brushed aluminum casing 5/8” walnut wood construction w/rounded corners old-school red LED clock w/alarm functions comes complete with wall transformer dimensions: 4” x 2.5” x 2.5” CLICK HERE FOR ALARM SOUND CLIP (note) European Transformer may require plug adaptor for specific country (Not Supplied) Note: If "European 220V model" reads sold out, please e-mail us for availability, we may be able to substitute......... images courtesy of Sébastien Kauffmann © 2009 >

description:
KNOX IE- INTERN EDITION, CHIPBOARD

name: // MOTOBOY BOXSET
description: Limited Edition reclaimed Exotic wood music box housing a copy of Moto Boy’s self-titled debut album and signed & numbered by the artist. The Music box plays the artists’ tune “A Room Without You”. Limited to only 25 pieces

name: // FREELANCER NOTEPADS
description:
FREELANCER NOTEPADS

We've teamed up with our good buddies at Holiday Matinee to give you a place to jot down all your inspirational ideas with these 3 packs of blank, unlined notepads. Featuring the best moto ever on the cover (and something we try to do everyday) "Love your Work, Work your Love (and repeat)" Sample Picture of Sketches courtesy of NYC artist Leah Goren for more images of what people do with their freelancers check the flickr gallery here Holiday Matinee is obsessed with good design, social responsibility and promoting creativity. Established in 1999, they live by the motto: Love your work, work your love. Go check them out at www.holidaymatinee.com

name: // EVERCALENDAR
description:
EVERCALENDAR


Solid Walnut Based perpetual calendar, features 1/16" white acrylic tabs with black and orange lettering in helvetica font. Each set comes complete with full set of days, months and dates. Walnut base is oiled with danish oil to highlight the woods natural beauty (note this is a representation of the base you will get, every one is unique and wood grain patterns will vary) Size: 9" x 1.5" x 2.5"

name: // FURNIGRAPHMUMBLETRONIC
description:
FURNIGRAPHMUMBLETRONIC


Super rad clubmumble.com digital watch collaboration, if you've not heard of it yet get on it!! clubmumble.com is a weblog featuring influences of contemporary art, skateboarding and street culture. The brainchild of Bob Kronbauer and now over 120 contributors strong.... Bonus! a portion of every watch sale is going to the contributor campaign which is focused on giving skateboards to underprivileged youth across Canada. Each watch comes with a badge that you should wear proudly stating "I am a contributor" “work smarter,not harder” engraved on watch back, a motto we should all strive to fulfill! * 1980’s style white LCD unisex wrist watch * bling gold buttons, clasp and watch back * stopwatch and alarm features * hourly chime, 12/24 hours selectable * "Somewhat" Water-resistant with PVC strap (don't shower or surf with it) * comes in clear plastic case with a 1 inch "I am a Contributor" button * face dimensions: 1 1/4” x 1 1/8” * colours: white w/ black face or white w/grey face * will fit wrists up to 8 inches in diameter

Note: as part of our "edition" series, these limited run items are working "experiments" and/or "collaborations" whose materials and processes allow us to "play" with new ideas and concepts. Due to their limited nature they are only available online and very select retailers and sell out quickly.

name: // FURNI x RBW 2009
description:
FURNI X RBW


CHECK OUT THE NEW SUMMER COLOURS IN THE RE-ISSUED MODELS HERE


Killer Raised by Wolves and Furni digital watch collaboration * 1980’s style LCD unisex wrist watch. * Phone book, stopwatch, countdown timer and multiple alarm features w/melody setting. * Hourly chime, 12/24 hours selectable and "dual time" mode * Water-resistant with PVC strap.(Not Waterproof! please don't shower with it!) * Indiglo style backlight. * face dimensions: 1 1/4” x 1 1/2” * Available in Black, Red and Cyan. * “this ain't the time to have your wrists freezin” engraved on watch back About Raised by Wolves In historic folklore, children raised by wolves were often gifted with superior strength, intelligence and morals such as Rome-founders: Remus and Romulus and Mogli, king of the jungle. This concept forms the base of Canadian label Raised by Wolves as they aim to create a new sense of loyalty among individuals who continue to pride themselves on personal strength and values. Founded in 2008, Raised by Wolves takes inspiration from all facets of underground culture, while maintaining standards in products they feel represent their personal taste. In addition, Raised by Wolves embraces the power of collective individuality, working closely with friends and family on unique design concepts. 100% Furious.

Note: as part of our "edition" series, these limited run items are working "experiments" and/or "collaborations" whose materials and processes allow us to "play" with new ideas and concepts. Due to their limited nature they are only available online and very select retailers and sell out quickly.

extremely limited edition vinyl shoulder/labtop bag (magical friends collaboration series) midnight black collaboration nation! the fine folks at furni (alliteration!) and toddland have teamed up to make this amazing messenger bag. the leather is faux, so you can fauxget about sending us hate mail. vintage feeling vinyl. padded shoulder strap. furni&toddland debossed logo at outside. one interior side lined with flannel. custom wood furni&toddland hangtag. back pocket is lined with laptop material. *limited to 100pcs worldwide. 100% vinyl. bags measure approx 17" long x 14" tall x 5.5" wide. more about toddland here
